name: Higrow  solution
description: Minoxidil solution and foam are used to help hair growth in the treatment of male pattern baldness. Minoxidil is not used for baldness at the front of the scalp or receding hairline in men. The foam and 2% minoxidil solution are also used to help hair growth in women with thinning hair. Minoxidil belongs to a class of medicines known as vasodilators.
label: medicine
